desc: Contributed as a senior developer at a product-based EdTech company, building 6 large-scale responsive web apps using React, TypeScript, Redux, and Tailwind CSS, with dynamic form validation and REST API integration.

Owned the admin portal lifecycle, including deployment, bug resolution, and collaboration with cross-functional stakeholders. Mentored 3 interns through code reviews, task assignment, and technical guidance.
tech: React.js, TypeScript, Redux, Tailwind CSS, Zod, REST APIs, Git, Yarn
conclusion: This role enabled me to take ownership of end-to-end features and sharpened my leadership and mentoring abilities while building scalable and performant EdTech platforms.

desc: Started as a trainee and was certified as a React developer during the onboarding phase. Initially worked as a Web Automation Tester using Selenium, JavaScript, and Mocha for a Netherlands-based client, and later transitioned into a frontend developer role.
